sentences.cn: 庞大而不讲人情的组织

sentences.en: As well as being precise, the report being delivered was impersonal.
sentences.cn: 这份稿子不仅用词确切, 而且不带个人色彩.

sentences.en: Banking has become increasingly impersonal due to the introduction of computerized systems.
sentences.cn: 银行由于引进了电子计算机应用系统后而变得更为非人格化了.

sentences.en: Before then many children were cared for in large impersonal orphanages.
sentences.cn: 在那以前，许多孩子在无人情味的大孤儿院里被照料。

sentences.en: Business letters do not have to be impersonal and formal.
sentences.cn: 商业信函并非一定要刻板而缺乏人情味。

sentences.en: He waved his hand slightly, his voice brisk and impersonal.
sentences.cn: 他的口气尖厉,不带一点感情,说着还轻轻用手一招.

sentences.en: His manner seemed rather stiff and impersonal.
sentences.cn: 他的态度似乎很生硬冷淡.

sentences.en: His manner was coolly polite and impersonal.
sentences.cn: 他的态度冷淡客气,公事公办.

sentences.en: I could never lose myself for long among impersonal things.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会在与个人无关的事物中迷失很久.

sentences.en: I gave Coe an impersonal stare.
sentences.cn: 我不带任何感情地盯着科。

sentences.en: I want you to try and be impersonal.
sentences.cn: 现在我要你尽量冷静下来.

sentences.en: Scientific knowledge aims at being wholly impersonal.
sentences.cn: 科学知识要求完全不受个人感情的影响。

sentences.en: She sounded so detached and impersonal that he began to feel exasperated.
sentences.cn: 这摆明出来的好像是第三者的态度,却把范博文激怒了.

sentences.en: Sometimes she seems a very impersonal, even unkind, mother.
sentences.cn: 有时她看起来是一个非常冷漠的母亲，甚至有些刻薄。

sentences.en: The health service has been criticized for being too impersonal.
sentences.cn: 公共医疗卫生服务一向被指责缺乏人情味。

sentences.en: The rest of the room was neat and impersonal.
sentences.cn: 房间的其余部分整洁干净，不带任何的个人色彩。

sentences.en: We must be as impersonal as a surgeon with his knife.
sentences.cn: 我们必须像外科医生拿手术刀时一样冷静客观，不受任何感情影响。

sentences.en: Work relations in such a situation are necessarily harsh and impersonal.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,劳资关系必然变得冷酷无情.

trans.tran_cn: 没有人情味的，非个人的，和个人无关的，不具人格的，一般性的，[语]非人称的
trans.tran_en: If you describe a place, organization, or activity as impersonal, you mean that it is not very friendly and makes you feel unimportant because it involves or is used by a large number of people

trans.tran_cn: 非人称动词；不具人格的事物
